sense.gloss: to advance on, to close in, to march on, to descend on (the enemy), to move towards, to surge forward (crowd, wave of nostalgia, wave, etc.), to rush for (the door), to inundate, to overwhelm, to push aside

sdata.j: ↑最大↑↓さいだい↓１０メートルの↑津波↑↓つなみ↓が↑押↑↓|お↓し↑寄↑↓よ↓せる|とみられます。
sdata.e: It is expected that the tsunami surge will be ten meters or less.
